body:
This file resides in `app/controllers/concerns`; typically, we only have modules here but this one is defined as a class (and rightfully so!)

I suggest moving it into `app/models`. We may want to separate what goes into `app/models/` at some point, but this is a somewhat controversial topic amongst Rails devs (ie. »only persistence objects should go there« vs. »a model is just a class so everything can go there« vs. »extract 'Service Objects' into a separate folder« … the list goes on). Sorting `app/models` is something for another day, for know I think it's best to move the class there.
